channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Setup Hugo Project
item.description: @random Initialize hugo repo hugo new site random -f yaml # use yaml cd random git init git branch -M master git commit --allow-empty -m "Initialize repo" Add initial site templates git add . git commit -m "Add hugo templates" Initialize hugo modules hugo mod init github.com/mesbah-uddin/random Add theme hugo mod get -u github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke echo "theme: github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke" >> config.yaml # also change baseURL git add . git commit -m "Add theme as go submodule" Push to remote git remote add origin git@github.
